title: BRIEF-India's Dharamsi Morarji Chemical Co Sept Quarter Net Profit Falls
text:
BRIEF-India's Dharamsi Morarji Chemical Co Sept Quarter Net Profit Falls

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:06)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Dharamsi Morarji Chemical Co Sept Quarter Net Profit Falls Oct 30 (Reuters) - Dharamsi Morarji Chemical Co Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT 43.4 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 107.9 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER TOTAL INCOME FROM OPERATIONS 448.9 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 572.6 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Dharamsi Morarji Chemical Co Sept Quarter Net Profit Falls
